name: Ayleouna in the Terrifying Wooden Space Station
name_original: Ayleouna in the Terrifying Wooden Space Station
description:
Very little attempt at horror game just 2 levels kill all the enemies.

controls: shoot with left mouse button or right rigger, aim with right mouse button or left trigger run with shift or left bumper, crouch with ctrl or b button, kick with x or middle mouse button
